patterns: What is Full form of DDC
responses: The Digital Demand Center is a solution to enables our business partners to search, log and track digital demands for automation, simplification and modernization.

patterns: Is DDC a replacement for the Helpdesk
How diffrent is this from AccessIT
responses: The DDC is NOT a replacement for the Helpdesk, AccessIT or MyLink.
Infrastructure, Purchases, General desktop assistance cannot be made on Digital Demade Center (DDC).
The Digital Demand Team is a group of individuals representing the Solution Spaces in our portfolio of automation tools and technologies
Everyone at BASF in North America may use the DDC. This portal was developed with the mindset that digital solutions can be built or reused within all the businesses, services, sites and processes.

patterns: What happens after I submit Request?
responses: The demand is then mapped to a Solution Space. The Solution Lead will then assign the Solution Analyst who will engage with the requestor for process review, requirement gathering and effort estimation (time and cost). Once approved, the request is turned over to our DevOps team for delivery.
The Demand Tracker lets you easily follow your request from initiation to closure. At any time during the process, you can visit your request to see the current status and follow its history
Progressive Web App (PWA), Robotic Process Automation (RPA), Power Apps, Power BI, Power Automate, Cloud Enablement

PWA is a platform agnostic application which is built using simple web technologies and delivered over the internet or intranet. Despite being a web-based technology, it can also work on various screen sizes like desktop, tablet and mobile phones and can easily make use of responsive design technology from websites.

Robotic Process Automation (RPA) is a technology based on the use of software robots that can be integrated in existing IT infrastructure and delivers repetitive, deterministic, high-volume tasks efficiently, quickly, and consistently.

A suite of apps, services, connectors and data platform that provides a rapid application development environment to build custom apps for your business needs.Using Power Apps you can quickly build custom business apps that connect to your data stored in various online and on-premises data sources .

This platform is a collection of software services, apps,and connectors that work together to turn your unrelated sources of data into coherent visually immersive and interactive insights. Whether your data is a simple Excel spreadsheet or a collection of data from different data sources, Power BI lets you easily connect to your data sources visualize (or discover) what's important and share that with anyone you want.

Service that helps you to create automated workflows between your favorite apps and services to synchronize files, get notifications, collect data and more.The following list summarizes the different types of flows
Cloud Enablement: Migration of applications to the cloud. Often by upgrading / replacing the applicaiton technology. Includes database migration.
